trans-unit.source: Represents the shared-connection version of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"></xref> service used by the runtime.
trans-unit.target: Representa a versão de ligação partilhada do <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"> </xref> serviço utilizado pelo runtime.

trans-unit.source: In this context, shared-connection means that the service uses the same SQL connection for both the tracking and persistence services.
trans-unit.target: Neste contexto, a ligação partilhada significa que o serviço utiliza a mesma ligação do SQL Server para o controlo e a persistência de serviços.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService service is used for database transactions that use a shared connection between different objects.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]O serviço de SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService é utilizado para transações da base de dados que utilizam uma ligação partilhada entre objetos diferentes.

trans-unit.source: To use the SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService instead of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> in your <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> instance, use the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para utilizar o SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService em vez do <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>no seu <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>instância, utilize o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A>método.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > If the SQL server used by the SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService is down such as that caused by SQL cluster failovers or intermittent network issues, the SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService will retry the commit process up to 20 times before raising a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled> event.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Se o SQL server utilizado pelo SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService está inativo, tais como o que causou a geração SQL cluster as ativações pós-falha ou problemas de rede intermitente, o SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService irá repetir o processo de consolidação até 20 vezes antes de gerar um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled>eventos.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The constructor is invoked when the workflow runtime engine loads services from an application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: O construtor é invocado quando o motor de execução do fluxo de trabalho carrega serviços a partir de um ficheiro de configuração de aplicação.

trans-unit.source: The valid key is `EnableRetries`.
trans-unit.target: A chave válida é `EnableRetries`.

trans-unit.source: This requests that the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"></xref> retry in case of a failed database connection.
trans-unit.target: Isto solicita que o <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"> </xref> repita em caso de uma ligação de base de dados falhou.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"></xref> class using a database connection string.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"> </xref> classe a utilização de uma cadeia de ligação de base de dados.

trans-unit.source: Database connection string.
trans-unit.target: Cadeia de ligação de base de dados.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets a value specifying whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"></xref> will retry committing a work batch.
trans-unit.target: Obtém e define um valor que especifica se o <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"> </xref> tentará consolidar um lote de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Retries of work batch commits for <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity> activities must be modeled into the workflow (usually using a while loop and exception handler outside of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity>).
trans-unit.target: Tentativas de trabalho do batch consolidações para <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity>atividades tem de ser modeladas no fluxo de trabalho (normalmente, com um enquanto processador ciclo e exceção fora do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity>).</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> cannot do retries in this case because it did not start (and therefore does not own) the transaction.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>não é possível efetuar novas tentativas neste caso, porque não foram iniciados (e, por conseguinte, não é proprietário) a transação.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>

trans-unit.source: Besides being set programmatically, this functionality can be enabled through a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Para além de que está a ser definido através de programação, esta funcionalidade pode ser ativada através de um ficheiro de configuração.

trans-unit.source: For more information on how to set this property through a configuration file, see [Workflow Configuration Files](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ada4bb90-6c9d-4f3d-a9d0-b559bb0f9909).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como definir esta propriedade através de um ficheiro de configuração, consulte [ficheiros de configuração do fluxo de trabalho](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ada4bb90-6c9d-4f3d-a9d0-b559bb0f9909).

trans-unit.source: For general information on retrying work batch transactions, see [Batching State Information in Workflows](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ecda18ba-9140-4bd7-b13d-6787fdf5959d).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações gerais sobre Repetir transações de batches de trabalho, consulte [informações de estado de criação de batches em fluxos de trabalho](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ecda18ba-9140-4bd7-b13d-6787fdf5959d).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the service should retry committing the work batch; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o serviço deve repetir consolidar o lote de trabalho; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method called when the workflow runtime raises the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método chamado quando o tempo de execução do fluxo de trabalho gera o <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method called to start the service.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método chamado para iniciar o serviço.
